articles.title: Dynamo hospitalised for Crohn's disease following COVID-19 battle - digitalspy.com
articles.description: "I will be back before you know it."
articles.content:
Dynamo is facing more medical problems following his recent battle with COVID-19.
The magician went to hospital earlier this week for a recurrence of his Crohn's disease on the same day as he was supposed to be giving inspirational speeches to others with th… [+2554 chars]

articles.author: Mari Jones, Ffion Lewis
articles.title: Welsh nurse dies after contracting coronavirus at hospital where she worked for 41 years - Daily Post
articles.description: Liz Spooner was described as someone who had 'always given her all, delivering an excellent standard of care'
articles.content:
A nurse who worked at the same Welsh hospital for 41 years has died after contracting coronavirus.
Liz Spooner primarily worked at the coronary care unit of Singleton Hospital, in Swansea, as well as ward nine.

articles.description: Fay Rayward, from Telford, says she had failed to get an urgent dental appointment during lockdown.
articles.content:
Image caption

articles.title: Call for cycling stats to be added to daily coronavirus transport figures - The Independent
articles.description: Travel stats are regular fixture at daily press conferences but don't include cycling
articles.content:
The government is being urged to add cycling to its daily round-up of coronavirus transport statistics in a bid to nudge people onto their bikes during the pandemic.
